meanings.definition: (ポルトガル語) 順応しなくなる、慣れなくなる、気候や環境への適応を失う
meanings.english_definition: (Portuguese) to become unacclimated; to lose adaptation to a climate or environment.

examples.sentence: Depois de morar muitos anos na praia, ele se desaclimatou ao frio da montanha.
examples.translation: 長年ビーチに住んだ後、彼は山の寒さに慣れなくなった。
examples.note: After living many years on the beach, he became unacclimated to the cold of the mountain.

examples.sentence: É importante se reaclimatar gradualmente após uma longa viagem para evitar se desaclimatar novamente.
examples.translation: 再び順応しなくなるのを避けるために、長旅の後は徐々に再順応することが重要です。
examples.note: It is important to reacclimate gradually after a long trip to avoid becoming unacclimated again.

collocations: desaclimatar-se ao frio (寒さに順応しなくなる)
desaclimatar-se ao calor (暑さに順応しなくなる)
desaclimatar-se à altitude (高度に順応しなくなる)

etymology.value: 「des-」（否定の接頭辞）+ 「aclimatar」（順応させる）+ 「-se」（再帰代名詞）

inflection.notes: This is a reflexive verb, meaning it requires a reflexive pronoun (me, te, se, nos, vos, se).

usage_notes.explanation: 「desaclimatar-se」は、ある気候や環境に順応していた人が、その適応を失うことを意味します。たとえば、暖かい地域に住んでいた人が寒い地域に引っ越して、寒さに慣れなくなる場合などに使われます。再帰動詞であるため、常に再帰代名詞を伴います。

examples.note: 再帰動詞なので、再帰代名詞が必要です。
「desaclimatar」は他動詞としても使えますが、この場合は再帰動詞「desaclimatar-se」が適切です。

readability_explanation.text: This word is relatively uncommon and specific, referring to the loss of acclimation to a climate or environment. It is most likely to be encountered in contexts related to travel, health, or environmental science.

example_sentences.sentence: Com o tempo, ela se desaclimatou ao calor intenso do deserto.
example_sentences.translation: 時が経つにつれて、彼女は砂漠の強烈な暑さに慣れなくなった。

example_sentences.sentence: É fácil se desaclimatar se você não se expõe regularmente ao clima local.
example_sentences.translation: 地元の気候に定期的に触れないと、簡単に順応しなくなる。
